name: Let's Bowl VR - Bowling Game
description: Welcome to Let's Bowl VR! This is an amazing bowling game for virtual reality with realistic physics and cool graphics. It's a great way to surprise your friends and have fun with the company playing a classic bowling game without leaving your home.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 or NVidia GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift with hand controlllers.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7-6800 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Fury or NVIDIA GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift with hand controlllers.
